links.*: The Disaster of the Gladden Fields

wikitext.*:
'''''Nernehta''''' is the [[Quenya]] name of the battle formation known in [[Sindarin]] as the '''''[[Dírnaith]]'''''.<ref name=Gladden>{{UT|Gladden}}, note 16</ref>

==Etymology==
It is derived from the Quenya words ''[[Nér]]'' "man" and ''[[nehte]]/[[nehta]]'' which is applied to any formation or projection tapering to a point.<ref name=Gladden/>
